roleset.name: enrapture, captivate, endrunken
roleset.note: INTOXICATE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from intoxicate.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The performance by more than 40 members of the Rome Philharmonic Orchestraintoxicated the audience and the musical fountain , hi-fi sound effect , fountain screen and stereographicprojection brought them to a marvelous world where sound , light and color blended even more [*T*-9] .
example.arg: The performance by more than 40 members of the RomePhilharmonic Orchestra

example.text: Applebee's' accidental intoxication of a toddler earned them national headlines this week.
